snippet.title: SUPER DRAGON BALL HEROES WORLD MISSION – Free Update & Demo Trailer | Switch, PC
snippet.description:
Super Warriors have joined the battle! The 1st FREE UPDATE is available now and includes 4 new SR ranked cards, 4 new stages, new extra mission mode, and more!

Now, you can also try the FREE demo for SUPER DRAGON BALL HEROES WORLD MISSION! Get more info: https://bandainam.co/SDBH

#SuperDragonBallHeroesWorldMission #DragonBall #BandaiNamco

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
